Extra.name: mi_word
Extra.expression: ifelse(len(@diy_word1),@diy_word1,'欢迎使用本主题！点击锁屏右上角可自定义更多功能！此处文字可自定义')

ContentProviderBinder.where: type=0 and (parent_id >= 0 or parent_id=-2) and snippet IS not NULL and snippet!=''

VariableCommand.name: air_quality
VariableCommand.expression: ifelse(#weather_aqi}=0**#weather_aqi{=50,'空气优',#weather_aqi}50**#weather_aqi{=100,'空气良好',#weather_aqi}100**#weather_aqi{=150,'轻度污染',#weather_aqi}150**#weather_aqi{=200,'中度污染',#weather_aqi}200**#weather_aqi{=300,'严重污染',#weather_aqi}300,'重度污染','获取信息异常')

Var.name: air_quality
Var.expression: ifelse(ge(#aqi,0)*lt(#aqi,50),'优',ge(#aqi,50)*lt(#aqi,100),'良',ge(#aqi,100)*lt(#aqi,150),'轻微污染',ge(#aqi,150)*lt(#aqi,200),'轻度污染',ge(#aqi,200)*lt(#aqi,300),'中度污染',ge(#aqi,300)*le(#aqi,500),'重污染','爆表')

VariableCommand.name: lunar_festival
VariableCommand.expression: ifelse( eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'1'),'元旦节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'14')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'2'),'情人节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'8')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'3'),'妇女节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'12')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'3'),'植树节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'4'),'愚人节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'5'),'劳动节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'4')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'5'),'青年节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'6'),'儿童节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'7'),'建党节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'8'),'建军节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'9'),'开学日', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'10')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'9'),'教师节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'10'),'国庆节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'11')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'11'),'光棍节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'31')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'10'),'万圣节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'24')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'12'),'平安夜', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'25')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'12'),'圣诞节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'初一')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'正'),'春节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'十五')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'正'),'元宵节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'初二')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'二'),'龙抬头', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'初五')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'五'),'端午节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'初七')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'七'),'七夕节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'十五')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'七'),'中元节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'十五')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'八'),'中秋节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'初九')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'九'),'重阳节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'初八')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'腊'),'腊八节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'廿三')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'腊'),'小年', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'三十')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'腊'),'除夕', #LunarNum==ifelse(#datetime_week==1,7,14)**eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'5'),'母亲节', #LunarNum==ifelse(#datetime_week==1,14,21)**eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'6'),'父亲节','')

VariableCommand.name: lunar_festival
VariableCommand.expression: ifelse( eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'1'),'元旦节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'14')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'2'),'情人节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'8')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'3'),'妇女节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'12')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'3'),'植树节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'4'),'愚人节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'5'),'劳动节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'4')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'5'),'青年节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'6'),'儿童节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'7'),'建党节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'8'),'建军节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'9'),'开学日', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'10')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'9'),'教师节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'1')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'10'),'国庆节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'11')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'11'),'光棍节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'31')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'10'),'万圣节', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'24')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'12'),'平安夜', eqs(@datetime_d[#LunarNum],'25')*eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'12'),'圣诞节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'初一')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'正'),'春节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'十五')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'正'),'元宵节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'初二')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'二'),'龙抬头', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'初五')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'五'),'端午节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'初七')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'七'),'七夕节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'十五')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'七'),'中元节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'十五')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'八'),'中秋节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'初九')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'九'),'重阳节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'初八')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'腊'),'腊八节', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'廿三')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'腊'),'小年', eqs(@datetime_e[#LunarNum],'三十')*eqs(@datetime_N[#LunarNum],'腊'),'除夕', #LunarNum==ifelse(#datetime_week==1,7,14)**eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'5'),'母亲节', #LunarNum==ifelse(#datetime_week==1,14,21)**eqs(@datetime_M[#LunarNum],'6'),'父亲节','')

Text.textExp: ifelse(#datetime_year==#year**#datetime_month==#month+1**#datetime_day==#date,'（当前为今天，可点选计算）','（所选日期距离今天'+ifelse(#datetime_ratio}0,'还有','已过去')+abs(#datetime_ratio)+'天）')
ifelse(#datetime_year==#year**#datetime_month==#month+1**#datetime_day==#date,'（当前为今天，可点选计算）','（所选日期距离今天'+ifelse(#datetime_ratio}0,'还有','已过去')+abs(#datetime_ratio)+'天）')

Text.name: djs
Text.textExp: '距离'+@djs_mc+ifelse(#is_past,'已过去','还有 ')+abs(#d_t)+'天'+abs(#d_s)+'小时'+abs(#d_f)+'分'+ifelse(#show_m,abs(#d_m)+'秒','')

Text.name: djs
Text.textExp: '距离'+@djs_mc+ifelse(#is_past,'已过去','还有 ')+abs(#d_t)+'天'+abs(#d_s)+'小时'+abs(#d_f)+'分'+ifelse(#show_m,abs(#d_m)+'秒','')

Var.name: air_quality
Var.expression: ifelse(ge(#aqi,0)*lt(#aqi,50),'优',ge(#aqi,50)*lt(#aqi,100),'良',ge(#aqi,100)*lt(#aqi,150),'轻度污染',ge(#aqi,150)*lt(#aqi,200),'中度污染',ge(#aqi,200)*lt(#aqi,300),'重度污染',ge(#aqi,300)*le(#aqi,500),'严重污染','爆表')

Text.text: 欢迎使用MIUI便签！便签已被隐藏！锁屏设置中可开启真实便签，右下角新建便签
愿你潇洒天涯，名扬天下。愿你走出半生，归来仍是少年。
半生的时间足让我们尝尽世间的苦乐,希望你不要放在心上,一如既往像少年一样。
行走的路上似乎会有几分落寞。但只要你行走在自己心的路途中，一切便无悔
知识和财富的不同点之一就是---前者无论在哪里得到，都没有什么可耻的。
生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但之后那些受伤的地方必定会变成我们最强壮的地方。
欢迎使用MIUI便签！便签已被隐藏！锁屏设置中可开启真实便签，右下角新建便签

Text.textExp: ifelse(#lockwake,'锁屏常亮-开','锁屏常亮-关')
ifelse(#lockwake,'锁屏常亮-开','锁屏常亮-关')

DateTime.formatExp: ifelse(#time_format,'M月d日 EEEE NNNN','M月d日 EEaa NNNN')
ifelse(#time_format,'M月d日 EEEE NNNN','M月d日 EEaa NNNN')
